    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitational potential energy and kinetic energy of a stone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche Gravitationsenergie und kinetische 
Energie eines Steins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie potentielle de la gravité et énergie 
cinétique d'une pierre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia potencial gravitacional e energia 
cinética de uma pedra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia potenziale gravitazionale ed energia 
cinetica di una pietra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια και κινητική ενέργεια μιας 
πέτρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía potencial gravitacional y energía 
cinética de una piedra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the stone at point A has gravitational potential energy and when the man drops it by 1 m to point B, it obtains kinetic energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Height</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stone</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Stein an Punkt A 
mögliche Gravitationsenergie hat und wann der Mann sie durch 1 m zu 
Punkt B fallenläßt, es erhält kinetische Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la pierre au point 
A a l'énergie potentielle de la gravité et quand l'homme la relâche
par 1 m au point B, il obtient l'énergie cinétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a pedra no ponto A 
tem a energia potencial gravitacional e quando o homem a deixa cair 
por 1 m ao ponto B, ele obtem a energia cinética.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che la pietra a punto
A ha energia potenziale gravitazionale e quando l'uomo la cade da 1 m.
a punto B, esso ottiene l'energia cinetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η πέτρα στο σημείο Α 
έχει τη βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια και όταν την ρίχνει το άτομο 
από 1 μ για να δείξει το β, λαμβάνει την κινητική ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la piedra en la 
punta A tiene energía potencial gravitacional y cuando el hombre la 
cae por 1 m a la punta B, él obtiene energía cinética.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Gravitationsenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
